title: Events
description: This document describes the fields in the events.json file.

eventDate.description: The day and date on which the event takes place.  (ex: "Thu, 12/1")

eventStartTime.description: The time at which the event starts.  (ex: "7:00 PM")

eventEndTime.description: The time at which the event ends.

eventOrgShort.description: Short name for the organization hosting.

eventOrgType.description: A descriptor of the organization type.  (ex: "LD", "County", "State", "Ally")

eventTitle.description: A title for the event. Please do NOT include the name of the organization hosting the event.

eventLocationName.description: Name of the location where the event will be held. (ex: "Yakima County Democrats office", "Mercer Island Community Center", "Home of John Smith")

eventLocationStreet.description: Street address for the event location. (ex: "123 Main St.")

eventLocationST.description: Two-letter state abberviation for the event location (ex: "WA")

eventLocationZip.description: ZIP code for the event location (ex: "98040")

eventWeb.description: Web address where visitors can find more information about this event.

eventDescription.description: Additional details about this event. (ex: "Doors open at 6pm and program starts at 7pm", "Dinner will be served", "Suggested $20 donation")
